/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and yellow, punctuated by occasional red and green accents, reflecting the vibrant city life. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through. Pedestrians can be seen as well, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene and casting shadows that add depth to the image.
